title: Penny and the Anonymous Club: Bound, Blindfolded and Bent Over by Multiple Men (MMMF)
description: Penny's never been taken by a group of men before, but now she's going all in. She's agreed to go to an erotic club where she will be tossed into a room with complete strangers who only want one to take her hard and without protection as many times as they can in an hour. Will Penny rebel against the overwhelming power of so many strange men, or will she find out just how much she likes it?
author: Beatrice Evenmorne
